description: Header file for the GridWidget class, which manages drawing the game board and arranging TileWidgets for a 2048 game implementation.

classes.name: GridWidget
classes.description: A QWidget-derived class responsible for rendering the game grid and managing tiles for the 2048 game, including layout, resizing, and drawing.

methods.name: GridWidget
methods.description: Constructor initializing the widget with an optional parent.

methods.name: setBoard
methods.description: Sets the game board state and optionally triggers animations for tile movement.

methods.name: resizeEvent
methods.description: Handles resize events to adjust tile layout.

methods.name: paintEvent
methods.description: Handles paint events to draw the widget, including the background and tiles.

methods.name: tileRect
methods.description: Calculates and returns the QRect for a specific tile position based on row and column.

methods.name: layoutTiles
methods.description: Arranges the TileWidgets within the grid, with optional animation.

methods.name: ensureTiles
methods.description: Ensures that the TileWidgets are created and ready for layout.
